name: secret-santa-api
description: 1. The user creates a game  2. The owner of the game will the owner key and the game id 3. The participants will be able to join the game with the game id and password (if the game has one) 4. When the owner of the game do a request to generate pairs, the pairs will be generated and the participants will receive an email with the name of the person they have to give a gift to.
author: Bernardo Farrobinha
